entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
